languages.text: "Коль судьба привела ко мне сегодня столь важную персону... Позвольте представиться — перед вами Фелек Кристоф Огюст, Хранитель сего места. Значит, вы прибыли не в качестве подкрепления предателям? Это хорошо. Однако, да будет вам известно, Эурак-V — священная обитель Дома Орселлио, путь в которую открыт лишь узкому кругу приближенных. И, позвольте заметить, вас нет в списке ожидаемых гостей".

traits.locale_text: "Коль судьба привела ко мне сегодня столь важную персону... Позвольте представиться — перед вами Фелек Кристоф Огюст, Хранитель сего места. Значит, вы прибыли не в качестве подкрепления предателям? Это хорошо. Однако, да будет вам известно, Эурак-V — священная обитель Дома Орселлио, путь в которую открыт лишь узкому кругу приближенных. И, позвольте заметить, вас нет в списке ожидаемых гостей".

languages.text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."
languages.original_text: "Коль судьба привела ко мне сегодня столь важную персону... Позвольте представиться — перед вами Фелек Кристоф Огюст, Хранитель сего места. Значит, вы прибыли не в качестве подкрепления предателям? Это хорошо. Однако, да будет вам известно, Эурак-V — священная обитель Дома Орселлио, путь в которую открыт лишь узкому кругу приближенных. И, позвольте заметить, вас нет в списке ожидаемых гостей".

traits.locale_text: "And since the fate brought such an important person into my abode... Allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, the Keeper of this place. So you did not arrive to reinforce the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, I need to point out that Eurac-V is a holy place for House Orsellio, a Sanctum Sanctorum that is open only to a few chosen attendants. And it pains me to say you are not on the expected guest list."

"And since the fate brought such an important person into my abode... Allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, the Keeper of this place. So you did not arrive to reinforce the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, I need to point out that Eurac-V is a holy place for House Orsellio, a Sanctum Sanctorum that is open only to a few chosen attendants. And it pains me to say you are not on the expected guest list."

"And since the fate brought such an important person into my abode... Allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, the Keeper of this place. So, you did not arrive to reinforce the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a few chosen ones. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

"And since the fate brought such an important person into my abode... Allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, the Keeper of this place. So, you did not arrive to reinforce the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a few chosen ones. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

"And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

"And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

languages.text: "Und da das Schicksal eine solch wichtige Person in mein Heim gebracht hat ... gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen. Vor Euch steht Felek Christoph August, der Hüter dieser Station. Ihr seid also nicht als Verstärkung für die Verräter gekommen? Das ist ja großartige Kunde. Ihr müsst allerdings wissen, dass Eurac V ein heiliges Sanctum des Hauses Orsellio ist, und dass der Pfad hierher nur wenigen Auserwählten offenbart wird. Es schmerzt mich, das zu sagen, doch Ihr steht nicht auf der Gästeliste."
languages.original_text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

traits.locale_text: "Und da das Schicksal eine solch wichtige Person in mein Heim gebracht hat ... Gestattet, dass ich mich vorstelle. Vor Euch steht Felek Christoph August, der Hüter dieser Station. Also, seid Ihr als Verstärkung für die Verräter gekommen? Das ist ja großartige Kunde. Ihr müsst allerdings wissen, dass Eurac V ein heiliges Sanctum des Hauses Orsellio ist, und dass der Pfad hierher nur wenigen Auserwählten offenbart wird. Es schmerzt mich, das zu sagen, doch Ihr steht nicht auf der Gästeliste."

languages.text: « Et puisque le destin amène quelqu'un d'aussi important en ma demeure... permettez que je me présente. Vous vous tenez devant Felek Christoph August, le gardien de cette station. Ainsi donc, vous ne venez pas prêter main-forte aux traîtres ? Voilà une excellente nouvelle. Néanmoins, vous devez comprendre qu'Eurac-V est un sanctuaire sacré pour la maison Orsellio, et le chemin qui y mène n'est révélé qu'à de rares élus. Je suis au regret de vous informer que vous ne figurez pas sur la liste des invités. »
languages.original_text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

traits.locale_text: « Et puisque le destin amène quelqu'un d'aussi important en ma demeure... Permettez-moi de me présenter. Vous vous tenez devant Felek Christoph August, le gardien de ces lieux. Ainsi donc, vous ne venez pas prêter main-forte aux traîtres ? Voilà une excellente nouvelle. Néanmoins, vous devez comprendre qu'Eurac-V est un sanctuaire sacré pour la maison Orsellio, et le chemin qui y mène n'est révélé qu'à de rares élus. Je suis au regret de vous informer que vous ne figurez pas sur la liste des invités. »

languages.text: “既然命运将如此显赫的人带到了我的居所……请允许我自我介绍一下。站在您面前的人，是费雷克·克里斯托夫·奥古斯特，这座星站的守护者。也就是说，您并不是来帮那群叛徒的吗？这真是个好消息。但话虽如此，您必须理解，欧拉克五号星站是奥赛罗家族的圣所，只有极少数被选中的人才有权前往。我很遗憾地告知您，您并不在名单上。”
languages.original_text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

traits.locale_text: “既然命运将如此显赫的人带到了我的居所……请允许我自我介绍一下。站在您面前的人，是费雷克·克里斯托夫·奥古斯特，这座星站的守护者。也就是说，您并不是那群叛徒的援军？这真是个好消息。但话虽如此，您必须理解，欧拉克五号星是奥塞罗家族的圣所，只有极少数被选中的人才有权前往。我很遗憾地告知您，您并不在名单上。”

languages.text: 「そして、運命がこのような重要人物を私の元へ連れてきたのだ…自己紹介させてもらおう。私はこのステーションの保持者、フェレック・クリストフ・オーガスト。裏切り者の援軍に来られたのではないのだな？素晴らしい知らせだ。とは言え、ユーラック・Vはオーセリオ家にとって聖域であり、そこまでの道は選ばれた少数の者しか知らないことをご理解いただきたい。こう言っては何だが、あなたは招かれざる客だ」
languages.original_text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、運命がこのような重要人物を私の元へ連れてきたのだ…どうか自己紹介させてくれ。目の前の私は、この場所の管理人フェレック・クリストフ・オーガストだ。それで、裏切り者の援軍に来たのではないのだな？素晴らしいニュースだ。とは言え、ユーラック・Vはオーセリオ家にとって聖域であり、そこまでの道は選ばれた少数の者しか知らないことを理解していただきたい。こう言っては何だが、あなたは招待者リストに載っていない」
「そして、運命がこのような重要人物を私の元へ連れてきたのだ…自己紹介させてもらおう。私はこのステーションの保持者、フェレック・クリストフ・オーガスト。裏切り者の援軍に来られたのではないのだな？素晴らしい知らせだ。とは言え、ユーラック・Vはオーセリオ家にとって聖域であり、そこまでの道は選ばれた少数の者しか知らないことをご理解いただきたい。こう言っては何だが、あなたは招かれざる客だ」

languages.text: «Puesto que el destino ha traído a alguien de semejante alcurnia a mi morada... Permítame que me presente. Se encuentra ante Felek Christoph August, guardián de la estación. Entonces, ¿no viene a apoyar a los traidores? Son grandes noticias. Dicho esto, tiene que entender que Eurac V es el sanctum sagrado de la casa Orsellio y el camino solo se revela a gente selecta. Y, sintiéndolo mucho, no está en la lista de invitados».
languages.original_text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

traits.locale_text: «Puesto que el destino ha traído a alguien de semejante alcurnia a mi morada... Permítame que me presente. Se encuentra ante Felek Christoph August, guardián de este lugar. Entonces, ¿no viene como refuerzo para los traidores? Son grandes noticias. Dicho esto, tiene que entender que Eurac V es el sanctum sagrado de la casa Orsellio y el camino solo se revela a unos pocos elegidos. Y, sintiéndolo mucho, no está en la lista de invitados».

languages.text: "Madem kader bu denli mühim bir şahsı evime getirmiş... Kendimi takdim edeyim. Bendeniz, Felek Christoph August. Bu istasyonun Sorumlusu'yum. Hainlere destek sağlama amacıyla gelmedin demek. Harika haber. Gerçi şunu da belirteyim: Eurac V, Orsellio Hanesi'nin mukaddes kutağıdır ve ona giden yol pek az kişiye açıktır. Üzülerek söylüyorum ki adın o listede yazmıyor."
languages.original_text: "And since fate has brought such an important person into my abode... allow me to introduce myself. Before you stands Felek Christoph August, Keeper of this station. So, you did not come to offer support to the traitors? This is great news. Having said that, you must understand that Eurac V is a holy sanctum for House Orsellio and the path to it is only revealed to a select few. It pains me to say you are not on the guest list."

traits.locale_text: "Madem kader bu denli mühim bir şahsı evime getirmiş... Kendimi takdim edeyim. Bendeniz, Felek Christoph August. Bu istasyonun Sorumlusu'yum. Hainlere destek sağlama amacıyla gelmedin demek. Harika haber. Gerçi şunu da belirteyim: Eurac V, Orsellio Hanesi'nin mukaddes kutağıdır ve ona giden yol pek az kişiye açıktır. Üzülerek söylüyorum ki adın o listede yazmıyor."
